name: clothed sex pov concepts
description:
It works... ish. As you can see in the samples, if you can see the samples... you can control the clothes a bit better during sex scenes. Kinda gacha, and sometimes/a lot of times the clothes are odd.

Main point of this was to consistently give the pov character a shirt. I might retrain to allow control over shirt and pants and the types, but right now it's mostly gacha, but doing plain text does seem to help, ex a man wearing a white shirt and green pants, a woman wearing a red dress sometimes does exactly that, but without cutoff or some similar extension, you're probably gonna have a lady with green hair.

trained specifically on

  • fellatio

  • 2girls

  • cowgirl position

  • anal

  • doggystyle

  • vaginal

  • handjob

  • missionary position

  • stealth sex

  • reverse cowgirl

Most seem to work to some degree or another, and it does combine well with other loras.

Combines very well with my kakure_eria style lora, if you like that style.

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description: first version, works, but it's a bit gacha
